column5: Looking for an honest mechanic in Toronto, Ideally in the 401/dvp area. Need to get a safety done on a family transfer and don't want to get the run around in it. Car was safied in the spring but now its run out and need to transfer it to a family member. Anyway, if anyone is or knows one let me know. I guess I can just go to the stealership... grrr... Thanks
best one I know in the area is Mike at Best for Less on midwest ave( midland ellesmere area)
one way to really know is to ask if they fish, if yes, run.
I would take ecmilley's advice. He's been doing all the work on my car, and I have nothing but good things to say about him and his work! Great guy, great deals, and quality work!  S.
If your willing to drive to Newmarket Vic at Simone performance . Very honest guy
RPM on Woodbine and O'Connor.  Honest guys and i've known him for years.  Tell him Nick Ho sent you.

I'm sure there's one or two around smewhere.  Where, I have no idea.  The thing you have to remember, doctors get to bury their mistakes, mechanics have to fix theirs.  Judging from what I've seen, on TV, good luck!
Lol I love it when marketplace does their undercover stuff...it's funny/scary  If u find a good mechanic close to me who will work on a hybrid and a hemi at the same time let me know lol  Good luck
Ralph's on Jane street north of Teston Rd in Vaughan
City Auto. North side of Eglinton east of McCowan. They will fix only what needs to be fixed. Say Peter recommended you. My 4runner is there right now, unfortunately.
